Node.Name: Start
Node.Text: My name is Olaf. I am a snowman, I've always dreamed about summer!

Node.Name: Node1
Node.Text: The blue skies and white clouds! Buzzing bees and dandelions! A day in the sun would be so amazing!

Node.Name: Node2
Node.Text: At the beach, I could really work on my snowman tan!

Node.Name: Node3
Node.Text: Or go sailing! Ahhhh, what a lovely breeze!

Node.Name: Node4
Node.Text: There's nothing more relaxing than a nice swim! All my cares would just melt away...

Node.Name: Node5
Node.Text: Summertime is also perferct for meeting new friends!

Node.Name: Node6
Node.Text: Winter is fine for penguins and ice...

Node.Name: Node6
Node.Text: ...but a tap-dancing seagull is twice as nice!

Node.Name: Node6
Node.Text: Summer is so full of surprises I can't wait for my dream to come true.

Node.Name: Node7
Node.Text: Then I can play with someone like you!
